title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn on advanced website indexing
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn on advanced website indexing
Turning on advanced website indexing generates an index for the websites that you specify when you create your data store. This requires [domainverification](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/domain-verification) and imposes a quota on the number of pages that you can index. You can [upgrade this quota](/generative-ai-app-builder/quotas#quota-for-webpage-indexing) if necessary. Advanced website indexing incurs [additional cost](/generative-ai-app-builder/pricing) . For more information, see [Advanced website indexing](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/about-advanced-features#advanced-website-indexing) .
To turn on advanced website indexing for an existing data store, follow these steps:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **Vertex AI Search and Conversation** page. [Vertex AI Search and Conversation](https://console.cloud.google.com/gen-app-builder/engines) 
- In the navigation menu, click **Data stores** .
- Click the data store for which you want to turn on advanced website search.
- On your data store page, in the **Type** row, click **Upgrade** .
- On the **Verify your domains** page, follow these steps:- Click **Verify** for an unverified domain. The **Welcome to Google SearchConsole** page appears.
- Follow the on-screen instructions to verify a domain or a URL prefix, depending on whether you are verifying an entire domain or a URL prefix that is part of a domain.When you have finished the domain verification workflow, the **Data** page for your data store appears. The **Status** column should indicate that indexing is in progress for the website. For more information, see [Verifyyour site ownership](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9008080) in the Search Console Help Center.
- Repeat for every unverified domain, then click **Upgrade to advancedindexing** .For more information about verifying domain ownership, see [Verify websitedomains](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/domain-verification)
